Class Expense

java.lang.Object
Expense
public class Expense extends Object
Expense class represents an expense with attributes such as name, amount, category, whether it is recurring, and the timestamp of creation.

      public Expense createExpense(String name, double amount, String category, boolean isRecurring)
      Creates a new Expense instance when called. Used in User class to add a new expense

      amount - the amount of the expense
      category - the category of the expense
